name: df-nei
params: setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, setvar s3
body: |- wceq(cnei, cmpt(s0, ctop, cmpt(s1, cpw(cuni(cv(s0))), crab(s2, cpw(cuni(cv(s0))), wrex(s3, cv(s0), wa(wss(cv(s1), cv(s3)), wss(cv(s3), cv(s2))))))))
comment: Define a function on topologies whose value is a map from a subset to its neighborhoods. (Contributed by NM, 11-Feb-2007.)
